definition: Mingguang county level city in Chuzhou 滁州[Chu2 zhou1], Anhui
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

Mingguang county level city in Chuzhou 滁州[Chu2 zhou1], Anhui
luminosity
lavender blue

sentences.english: I am from Mingguang Anhui province , and work in Shanghai .
sentences.chinese: 我是安徽明光人，现在上海工作。

sentences.english: They decided to visit his house again to save Ming Guang.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定再上去他家看，是否明光已安全了。

sentences.english: In the end, you might find traces of the contentment and illumination they realized.
sentences.chinese: 到最后也许我们可以发现他们所了悟到的满足与明光。

sentences.english: What is the ghost trying to get from Ming Guang?
sentences.chinese: 女鬼和明光到底有什么关系？

sentences.english: The Emperor Xuan Lin Hou give India, general wear out Ming palace.
sentences.chinese: 天子临轩赐侯印，将军佩出明光宫。

sentences.english: God desires us to shine as lights in the world.
sentences.chinese: 上帝有旨意要我们在世上如明光照耀。

sentences.english: His round face always seemed to gleam slightly.
sentences.chinese: 他的圆脸似乎总是明光铮亮的。

sentences.english: The floor has been rubbed clean and shiny.
You are the light in a dark room and I am the moth who can't resist it.
sentences.chinese: 你是暗室中的明光，而我就是无法抗拒你的飞蛾。

sentences.english: In unborn luminosity, take a nice rest.
sentences.chinese: 在无生的明光中，好好休息。

sentences.english: Through the use of three terms Mingguang importance in painting.
sentences.chinese: 本文通过三个方面来说明光的运用在绘画中的重要性。
